In the News

Maya midwifes in rural Guatemala are using an app that allows them to detect issues during pregnancies in order to reduce the number of deaths during childbirths among the indigenous population. (App Saves Lives of Maya Women In Guatemala, nbcnews.com)

2017 Clifford Lab
